data.title: Joyalukkas inaugurated another big showroom in Andhra Pradesh at Tirupati
data.meta_description: Tirupati: Globally renowned jewellery retailer Joyalukkas, continues its rapid expansion across India. The world’s favorite jeweller has ventured into the holy city, Tirupati and the cultural hub.The showroom will follow the signature Joyalukkas large format designs and will be home to over 1 million designs across a range of jewellery forms such as gold, diamond,…
data.text:
Tirupati: Globally renowned jewellery retailer Joyalukkas, continues its rapid expansion across India. The world’s favorite jeweller has ventured into the holy city, Tirupati and the cultural hub.The showroom will follow the signature Joyalukkas large format designs and will be home to over 1 million designs across a range of jewellery forms such as gold, diamond, precious stones, polki platinum and pearl jewellery. Superstar style icon Allu Arjun inaugurated the showroom in the presence of various dignitaries and other VIPs. Every resident of Tirupati was invited for the inauguration.

Joyalukkas Jewellery is a retail chain with 95 showrooms spread across 10 countries around the world which include Singapore, London, UAE, Malaysia, Saudi Arabia, Bahrain, Kuwait, Qatar, Oman, India and today is a part of the multi-billion dollar global conglomerate, which has various business interests. The Joyalukkas Group business interests today include Jewellery, Money Exchange, Fashion & Silks, Luxury Air Charter, Malls and Lifestyle developers. The jewellery retailer currently has a customer base of over 10 million worldwide and offers over 1 million choices in all types of jewellery at its showrooms.

“We have ventured into landmark location. The holy & blessed city, Tirupati. This is a milestone for us to open in city serving the location with globally renowned Joyalukkas Jewellery experience. The city has its unique character hence, our offering will be exclusively tailored to the needs and demands of the customers shopping here.” said Mr. Joy Alukkas, Chairman & MD, Joyalukkas Group.

The Joyalukkas Tirupati showroom is located on the popular Prakasham Road and offers ample parking space and a very extensive shopping area. The showroom features with dazzling collections and exquisite designs in gold, diamond, precious stones, platinum, silver and pearls. The collections will be a mix of traditional, ethno contemporary and international designs that have won the hearts and millions of customers around the world.

Joyalukkas Brand ambassador Allu Arjun said, ‘Joyalukkas is the world’s favourite jeweller because they offer world’s best jewellery shopping experience hence the people in the blessed city of Tirupati and will get a world class shopping experience at this world class jewellery destination. My pleasure is doubled because of Lord Venkateswara’s blessings during the visit.

“My vision for our jewellery business is to ‘ornament the world’ by offering customers with the best mix of Price, Choice, Convenience, Service. Me and my team, work every single day to ensure this at all times. I am sure that the jewellery lovers in Tirupati will love our dazzling jewellery collections, designs and the great experience we have brought for them.” added Joy Alukkas.

Other unique features of Joyalukkas jewellery includes consumer friendly, value added schemes, Joyalukkas Golden Rewards Card, 100% buy back guarantee and more.

This international jewellery retail chain is also one of few retail chains to be recognised with many awards and accolades for its exceptional standards in jewellery retailing. It’s popular Chennai showroom has been recognised by the Limca Book of records for being the largest jewellery showroom in the world. Joyalukkas has also been awarded the prestigious ‘Superbrand’ status 5 years in a row in the UAE.
